name: TranAD
paper: TranAD: deep transformer networks for anomaly detection in multivariate time series data. Proc. VLDB Endow. 15, 6 (February 2022), 1201–1214.
description: TranAD is a deep transformer network based anomaly detection and diagnosis model which uses attention-based sequence encoders to swiftly perform inference with the knowledge of the broader temporal trends in the data.
